author: jbowden@thehill.com (John Bowden)
title: Global coronavirus cases surpass 2 million
description: The number of confirmed cases of coronavirus worldwide surpassed 2 million on Wednesday as countries around the globe remain in partial or complete lockdown in an attempt to stop the virus from spreading further.Data from Johns...
content:
The number of confirmed cases of coronavirus worldwide surpassed 2 million on Wednesday as countries around the globe remain in partial or complete lockdown in an attempt to stop the virus from spreading further.
